text: Lotta Engberg (born 5 March 1963 in Överkalix,) is a Swedish dansband and schlager singer.Discogs She participated at the Eurovision Song Contest in 1987. == Discography == ===Solo albums=== *Fyra Bugg & en Coca Cola (1987) *Fyra Bugg & en Coca Cola och andra hits (2003) *Kvinna & man (Lotta Engberg & Jarl Carlsson, 2005) *Världens bästa lotta (2006) *Jul hos mig (2009) * Lotta & Christer (2012, Lotta Engberg & Christer Sjögren) ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish singers
title: Lotta Engberg
